I've been trying to be less anti-atheist lately, so I've subscribed to a few blogs that seem...well, non-assholish.
But even with those, it often gets really obnoxious.
This is part of a series of posts from different young (college and high school) atheists.
It doesn't make a lick of sense coming from people who claim to be rational, realistic, and skeptical.
and yes
Nazi Zombies are the only safe group to demonize anymore

http://www.patheos.com/blogs/friendlyatheist/2011/08/05/dogma-vs-democracy/

"Ultimately, democracy means that we choose our future. There is the fundamentalist, misogynist, racist, bigoted future of those that would exploit ignorance. And there is the enlightened humanist future where all people are deemed intrinsically valuable and worthy of compassion."
WTF?
Yeah. And I *expect* it from right-wing religious fundamentalists. It's unremarkable there.

And it comes on the heels of a post that was laughably naive about racial diversity, and another post that described aggressive sexual harassment of atheist women by atheist men at an atheist conference.
Ha.
Of course, it's probably unfair of me to find this so remarkable. Since almost every social/political/religious movement is just as flawed.
